meanings.definition: A decorative band on a building
meanings.sent1: The frieze on the old house was painted with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The ancient temple had a beautiful frieze depicting a battle scene.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to climb the frieze but slipped and fell.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the frieze, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the frieze captured the attention of all who passed by.

meanings.definition: A sculptured or richly ornamented band in architecture
meanings.sent1: The frieze above the doorway featured intricate carvings of mythical creatures.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a frieze from ancient Greece, showcasing the artistry of the time.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal a nut from the frieze but got stuck instead.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes traced the frieze, each figure telling a story of the past.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight illuminated the frieze, bringing the figures to life in a golden glow.

meanings.definition: A horizontal band of decoration on a wall
meanings.sent1: The colorful frieze along the hallway added a cheerful touch to the school.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a whimsical frieze of animals playing in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel ran along the frieze, pretending to be a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers traced the frieze, feeling the texture of each intricate design.
meanings.sent5: The frieze seemed to dance in the candlelight, casting playful shadows on the wall.
